name: Neuron Connections
description:
You play as Neuron! Neuron is the only braincell left in the brain. Your task is to solve the incoming pain signals by connecting the limb nerves to the right type of pain before the time is out. As the game progresses the combinations become more complicated. Neuron is so overworked. 

Do you think you can take on the job Neuron does?

Made for Global Game Jam 2023

Credits

Programming by TastyPastry2 & ITR
Art by Mari Tendenes Ruud & Ragnys
Sound design & editing by Nevaehb. 
Creative Director & Concept by jaxyscreams
Sounds from zapsplat.com.
All music by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com).
